facts.text: I'm the biggest fish in the entire ocean! I can grow up to 60 feet long - that's as big as a school bus!
Even though I'm huge, I only eat tiny things! I filter plankton and small fish through my giant mouth.
My spots are like fingerprints! Every whale shark has a unique pattern that scientists use to identify us.
I'm super gentle! Divers can swim right next to me because I'm not dangerous to humans at all.
I'm a shark, not a whale! Even though I'm called a whale shark, I'm actually a fish with gills.

profile.diet: Plankton, fish eggs, and small fish
